document.full_text: simon cowell wants his former "american idol" sparring partner paula abdul and british singer cheryl cole join him on the u.s. version of his tv contest "the x factor."
document.title: cowell wants paula abdul, cheryl cole for 'x factor'
lines_and_colors: simon cowell wants his former "american idol" sparring partner paula abdul and british singer cheryl cole join him on the u.s. version of his tv contest "the x factor."
